room_title: Escape room "Mafia Heist" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Mafia Heist was a totally immersive experience with the Speak Easy decor and inventive puzzles and clues!! Our team has completed almost 50 escape games and we absolutely loved this one! A must do!!

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Heist" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: My three friends and I did the Mafia Heist escape room. Two were escape room rookies, but everyone did fine. The employee (I forget their name) was really nice and helpful explaining the rules to us. We're planning on going back to try and escape from The Attic.

room_title: Escape room "Mafia Heist" by EscapeX Rooms in Los Angeles
review: Went here for my friends birthday (group of 10) and we all made it through Mafia Heist with 8 minutes to spare. This was my first escape room experience and I had a really fun time. I think Mafia Heist is a great start for first timers like me!
